traditional.text: There is no emotion, there is peace. There is no ignorance, there is knowledge. There is no passion, there is serenity. There is no chaos, there is harmony. There is no death, there is the Force.
traditional.interpretation: The traditional Jedi Code emphasizes emotional control, knowledge-seeking, inner peace, cosmic harmony, and acceptance of mortality through connection to the eternal Force.
traditional.source: Jedi Academy Training Manual, various novels

emotion_variant.text: Emotion, yet peace. Ignorance, yet knowledge. Passion, yet serenity. Chaos, yet harmony. Death, yet the Force.
emotion_variant.interpretation: A more nuanced interpretation acknowledging that emotions exist but should not control decisions, popular during Luke's New Jedi Order era.

sith_code.text: Peace is a lie, there is only passion. Through passion, I gain strength. Through strength, I gain power. Through power, I gain victory. Through victory, my chains are broken. The Force shall free me.
sith_code.interpretation: The Sith philosophy embraces emotion and personal power as paths to freedom and strength, directly opposing Jedi restraint.
principles: Rejection of peace in favor of passionate pursuit

potentium.description: Belief that the Force itself is neither light nor dark, but that evil comes from the choices of individuals.
potentium.controversy: Rejected by mainstream Jedi Order as dangerous oversimplification

imperial_knights.description: Force users serving the Fel Empire, using both light and dark side techniques while maintaining loyalty to order and justice.
principles: Practical use of all Force abilities

force_push.name: Force Push/Telekinesis
force_push.description: The most basic telekinetic ability, allowing Force users to move objects with their minds.
force_push.limitations: Requires concentration and line of sight, effectiveness decreases with distance and object mass

force_jump.name: Force Jump/Leap
force_jump.description: Enhancement of natural jumping ability through Force augmentation.

force_speed.name: Force Speed/Burst of Speed
force_speed.description: Temporary enhancement of movement and reaction speed through Force energy.
force_speed.duration: Brief bursts, unsustainable for extended periods

force_sense.name: Force Sense/Perception
force_sense.description: Passive awareness of Force disturbances, emotions, and presences.
force_sense.enhancement: Can be trained to incredible precision

force_heal.name: Force Heal
force_heal.description: Acceleration of natural healing processes through Force energy.
force_heal.limitations: Cannot heal death, requires physical contact or close proximity
force_heal.cost: Drains Force user's energy, potentially life force for severe healing

battle_meditation.name: Battle Meditation
battle_meditation.description: Large-scale coordination and morale enhancement of allied forces through the Force.
battle_meditation.range: Can affect entire fleets and armies

force_protection.name: Force Protection/Barrier
force_protection.description: Creation of protective Force barriers against physical and energy attacks.

animal_friendship.name: Animal Friendship/Beast Control
animal_friendship.description: Communication with and influence over non-sentient creatures.
animal_friendship.limitations: Effectiveness varies by creature intelligence and Force sensitivity

force_lightning.name: Force Lightning
force_lightning.description: Projection of deadly electrical energy through hatred and anger.
force_lightning.dangers: Corrupts user, can be redirected, deadly to cybernetics
force_lightning.requirements: Deep connection to dark side emotions

force_choke.name: Force Choke/Grip
force_choke.description: Telekinetic constriction of target's airway or entire body.
force_choke.range: Can be performed at great distances with sufficient power

drain_life.name: Drain Life/Force Drain
drain_life.description: Absorption of life energy from living beings to strengthen oneself.

force_rage.name: Force Rage
force_rage.description: Enhancement of physical abilities through channeled anger and hatred.
force_rage.cost: Physical and mental exhaustion, potential loss of control

force_phantom.name: Force Phantom/Projection
force_phantom.description: Creation of a Force-projected duplicate capable of interacting with the physical world.
force_phantom.limitations: Extreme concentration required, often fatal to user

shatterpoint.name: Shatterpoint
shatterpoint.description: Perception of critical stress points in objects, situations, and the Force itself.
shatterpoint.philosophy: Reveals the fragility underlying apparent strength

force_walk.name: Force Walk/Essence Transfer
force_walk.description: Binding the spirits of dead Force users to serve the practitioner.
force_walk.dangers: Risk of possession, madness, spiritual destruction

force_storm.name: Force Storm (Space-Time)
force_storm.description: Creation of hyperspace wormholes and space-time distortions.
force_storm.control: Extremely difficult to control, often destroys user

form_i_shii_cho.name: Form I: Shii-Cho (Way of the Sarlacc)
form_i_shii_cho.description: The most ancient lightsaber form, emphasizing basic techniques and wide, sweeping movements.
form_i_shii_cho.philosophy: Determination and persistence, like the sarlacc's patient hunting

form_ii_makashi.name: Form II: Makashi (Way of the Ysalamiri)
form_ii_makashi.description: Elegant dueling form focused on precision and economy of motion, developed for lightsaber-to-lightsaber combat.
form_ii_makashi.philosophy: Refinement and superiority, precise control over raw power

form_iii_soresu.name: Form III: Soresu (Way of the Mynock)
form_iii_soresu.description: Defensive form emphasizing protection and patience, perfect against blaster fire.
form_iii_soresu.philosophy: Patience and protection, wearing down opponents through defense
form_iii_soresu.philosophy_note: Defense until opponent makes fatal mistake

form_iv_ataru.name: Form IV: Ataru (Way of the Hawk-Bat)
form_iv_ataru.description: Aggressive form utilizing acrobatics and Force-enhanced mobility for overwhelming offense.
form_iv_ataru.philosophy: Aggression and speed, striking from unexpected angles
form_iv_ataru.requirements: High Force sensitivity and physical conditioning

form_v_shien_djem_so.name: Form V: Shien/Djem So (Way of the Krayt Dragon)
form_v_shien_djem_so.description: Power-based form combining strong defense with devastating counterattacks.

variants.shien: Focus on deflecting blaster bolts back at attackers
variants.djem_so: Emphasis on overpowering lightsaber opponents with strength

form_v_shien_djem_so.philosophy: Strength and domination, turning defense into offense

form_vi_niman.name: Form VI: Niman (Way of the Rancor)
form_vi_niman.description: Balanced form incorporating elements from all previous forms, emphasizing Force integration.
form_vi_niman.philosophy: Balance and moderation, combining lightsaber skills with Force powers
weaknesses: Vulnerable to masters of other forms
form_vi_niman.specialization: Often used as foundation for dual-saber combat

form_vii_juyo_vaapad.name: Form VII: Juyo/Vaapad (Way of the Vornskr)
form_vii_juyo_vaapad.description: Ferocious form channeling inner darkness while maintaining light side control.

variants.vaapad: Mace Windu's refinement, channeling inner darkness safely

form_vii_juyo_vaapad.philosophy: Controlled ferocity, using inner darkness without falling
form_vii_juyo_vaapad.requirements: Exceptional mental discipline and Force mastery
form_vii_juyo_vaapad.danger: Only three Jedi successfully mastered Vaapad without falling

jar_kai.name: Jar'Kai (Dual-blade combat)
jar_kai.description: Fighting style using two lightsabers simultaneously.

saberstaff.name: Saberstaff/Double-bladed lightsaber
saberstaff.description: Lightsaber with blades on both ends of an extended hilt.

curved_hilt.name: Curved-hilt lightsaber
curved_hilt.description: Lightsaber with curved handle for enhanced precision and dueling capability.

youngling.description: Force-sensitive children brought to the Jedi Temple for initial training.
youngling.trials: Selection by a Jedi Master as Padawan

padawan.description: Apprentice to a Jedi Knight or Master, learning through direct mentorship.

jedi_knight.description: Full Jedi who has passed the trials and gained independence.

jedi_master.description: Experienced Jedi who has trained a Padawan to Knighthood or shown exceptional wisdom.
jedi_master.requirements: Train Padawan to Knight status OR exceptional service/wisdom

grand_master.description: Leader of the Jedi Order, typically the wisest and most experienced Master.
grand_master.selection: Chosen by Jedi Council or circumstances

jedi_high_council.description: Primary governing body of the Jedi Order.

council_of_first_knowledge.description: Council overseeing Jedi education and training.

council_of_reconciliation.description: Council handling diplomatic missions and peaceful conflict resolution.

council_of_reassignment.description: Council managing Jedi Service Corps and alternative assignments.
council_of_reassignment.purpose: Ensuring all Force-sensitives can serve meaningfully

agricultural_corps.description: Jedi who use Force abilities to enhance farming and food production.

educational_corps.description: Jedi serving as teachers and educators throughout the galaxy.

medical_corps.description: Jedi specializing in healing and medical assistance.

exploration_corps.description: Jedi exploring unknown regions and surveying new worlds.

nightsisters.description: Matriarchal society using dark side magic and alchemy.
nightsisters.philosophy: Feminine power through dark side mastery

sith_species.description: Original Sith species who developed dark side practices before human Jedi arrival.
sith_species.history: Conquered by Dark Jedi exiles who became Sith Lords
sith_species.legacy: Genetic and cultural foundation of Sith Order

prophets_dark_side.description: Cultists worshipping the dark side as a deity.

church_of_force.description: Religious organization venerating the Force during Imperial era.

guardians_whills.description: Ancient order protecting Jedi holy sites and kyber crystals.
guardians_whills.philosophy: Force balance and protection of sacred places
guardians_whills.connection: One with the Force, the Force is with me

je_daii.description: Precursor organization to both Jedi and Sith orders.
je_daii.history: Split into light and dark factions, leading to modern orders
